title: Himi 261
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ko e kakai ‘o māmani,
Ko e halaia,
Ko e kakai tō ki lalo,
Pea houhau’ia.
2.
Ko e kakai tu’utāmaki,
Ki he luo vela;
Ko e totongi totonu,
Ki he angahala.
3.
Ko e kakai fihi kovi
‘I he angahia
Pea ‘oku ‘ikai mafai,
Ke ikuna ia.
4.
Ko e kau masiva lelei,
Pea mohu kovi,
Ko e kakai hopoate,
Ki he fili lahi.
5.
’Oku pehe ‘etau tupu,
‘I he maama kovi,
‘O ta’e ‘amanekina,
Ki he maama lelei. *
